## ModalStorePop type

Pop the modal with given id. If `id` is not provided, pop the topmost modal

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ModalStorePop = <
	Pushed extends ModalPushOutput<Component, Resolved>,
	Component extends ModalComponentBase,
	Resolved extends ModalResolved<Component>,
>(
	pushed?: Pushed,
	resolved?: Resolved,
) => Pushed | undefined;
```

**References:** [ModalPushOutput](./modal.modalpushoutput.md)<!-- -->, [ModalComponentBase](./modal.modalcomponentbase.md)<!-- -->, [ModalResolved](./modal.modalresolved.md)

## Remarks

When calling this manually (rather than being called from the `ModalPortal` component), the trigger is expected to be `pop`<!-- -->;
